page.title: 01The Northwich Area
page.content: We are in a pleasant,semi rural area,a few miles south of Northwich.It consists of 3 compact village communities (Davenham,Moulton and Leftwich) Whose origins stretch back to before the Norman Conquest.It conveniently encompasses major road,rail and water routes to the nearby cities of Chester,Manchester, Warrington and Crewe,where many people commute to work.Housing is very varied in size,style and age ranging from expensive,detached homes to more modest council terraces.Some properties are Georgian or mid-Victorian. Most of the local farming is dairy. Our block includes 3 Primary schools,1 Secondary school,1 Fire Station,6 Churches ,6 Public Houses,2 Homes for the elderly and a variety of small shops.
